resources.string: Use these buttons to move the AMEDA to different positions. Press down on the plate to get a feel for what each position is like. Please note that the board needs to be in the horizontal position before the AMEDA will respond to a move command.
"Sorry, you've already used up your five moves to this position."
Unrecognised response received from the AMEDA. Unfortunately, it is not possible to continue with the familiarisation task.
